sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_client_02460ba383309210c99ca6d0deaad394
sys_update_xml.payload:
truefalseThis client script validates form submissions for active tasks in ServiceNow. The script ensures that specific conditions are met before allowing the form to be submitted. The validation criteria include: Active Status: The task must be marked as active. Group Selection: At least one group must be selected in the group list field. Task Type: Either "SC Task" or "Incident" must be marked as true. Catalog Item Validation: If "SC Task" is selected, at least one item must be chosen from the catalog items field, or the "All Catalog Items" option must be checked. Incident Priority: If "Incident" is selected, at least one of the priority fields (P1, P2, P3, P4, P5) must be true. Error Handling: If any of the validation criteria are not met, an alert will display detailing the specific errors, and the form submission will be prevented until corrections are made.truetrueonSubmit Validationsys_script_clientadmin2024-09-28 18:52:53global/02460ba383309210c99ca6d0deaad3940onSubmit Validationfabcaa2383bc5210c99ca6d0deaad386fabcaa2383bc5210c99ca6d0deaad386sys_script_client_02460ba383309210c99ca6d0deaad394admin2024-09-28 18:52:53x_snc_auto_assign_subscription
onSubmit10

sys_update_xml.name: sys_script_include_2527e7a383f09210c99ca6d0deaad353
sys_update_xml.payload:
publictruex_snc_auto_assign.AutoAssignmentfalse***Auto-Assignment for Catalog task & Incident*** NOTE: "will triggering this please only send glide object of task table only" sysIdsToExclude => this array consist of subscription sys_id which are supposed to be ignored. This script include is designed to assign catalog task & incidents automatically based on certain criteria stored in the u_tickets_auto_assignment_subscription and u_tickets_auto_assignment_tracker tables. function detail: assignTicket => Main Function, this runs whole logic getSubscriptions => this provides subscription based on assignmentGroup, isIncident, isCatalogTask, categoryOrItem, current.priority toBeAssigned => this picks the next person who is supposed to be assigned isEligible => this checks for where person who is selected, is eligible to be assignedfalseAutoAssignmentfalsesys_script_includeadmin2024-09-28 21:15:062527e7a383f09210c99ca6d0deaad35310AutoAssignmentfabcaa2383bc5210c99ca6d0deaad386fabcaa2383bc5210c99ca6d0deaad386sys_script_include_2527e7a383f09210c99ca6d0deaad353admin2024-09-28 22:00:582527e7a383f09210c99ca6d0deaad353admin2024-09-28 21:15:065547ab6383f09210c99ca6d0deaad3b60admin2024-09-28 21:15:06sys_script_include
true
